House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08117
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING PRE-SCHOOL EDUCATION, INCREASING THE MONTHLY COMPENSATION OF DAY CARE WORKERS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to improve pre-school education by providing funds for the establishment, maintenance, and operation of barangay day care centers; provide for a standard pay for day care workers; and to develop the curriculum used in pre-schools.
ALIAS NAME : “Pre-School Education Development Act.”
